channel.title: How can i make 7mill on rs in like 2days?

item.title: How can i make 7mill on rs in like 2days?
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:14, topic:249253”][quote author=Archer link=topic=328544.msg2574525#msg2574525 date=1228871495]

so how can i?

Depending on how long you play, barrows is probably your answer. If you can get MORE than 4 trips in per hour, you should be able to make 7m in 20-25 hours, which is 2 days worth for most runescape players.

I may have had bad luck but I went 32 trips without any barrows piece.
[/quote]

If you can do 4 trips an hour, then 32 trips doesn’t seem like much. Plus, there are certain strategies one takes to make sure their reward is always randomized. Some of these tricks have gotten me some pretty good booty in the past, making a lot of money nowadays.[/quote]
On my 12th trip I got Dharok’s helm but forgot to record, on 15th trip I got Guthan’s Spear and on my 20th trip I got Guthan’s Body. 20 trips = More than 6m at that time

Guthan Spear vid: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DaZWQ8ELvuU&feature=channel_page

Guthan Body vid: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yAmswjHtNHw&feature=channel.

Both vids were recorded on one of my accounts: Terror Arab (lul)

Just realized that the Guthan Body one, was done last day of 2007.

Read full topic
item.source: How can i make 7mill on rs in like 2days?

item.title: How can i make 7mill on rs in like 2days?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“Archer, post:11, topic:249253”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=328544.msg2574524#msg2574524 date=1228871435]

so how can i?

Depending on how long you play, barrows is probably your answer. If you can get MORE than 4 trips in per hour, you should be able to make 7m in 20-25 hours, which is 2 days worth for most runescape players.
[/quote]

I may have had bad luck but I went 32 trips without any barrows piece.[/quote]

If you can do 4 trips an hour, then 32 trips doesn’t seem like much. Plus, there are certain strategies one takes to make sure their reward is always randomized. Some of these tricks have gotten me some pretty good booty in the past, making a lot of money nowadays.
